experiences.title: Software Engineer Internship
experiences.subtitle: Rocket Mortgage LLC, Detroit, MI
workDescription: Developing internal tools and building infrastructure to allow analysts and engineers to access crucial data 4x faster.
Revising and writing set of components and UI design pattern to develop Rocket Design System written in Angular.
Improving the web application performance from UI to database to enhance the end user experience.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Samsung Research Institute Bangalore
workDescription: Development of System software for real time ML use-cases like Night Mode, Shot suggestion, Single Take on Samsung Mobile Devices.
Added support for many new operations present in DNN to run efficiently and securely for various frameworks like Tensorflow, TFLite, Caffe for real-time use cases.
Implemented support for mixed-precision format i.e FP16, which reduced inference time and memory upto 2.5x on the most arithmetically intense model architectures.
Worked on optimizations by writing compute unit-specific kernels to reduce inference time of operations(Convolution, pooling, etc.) on GPU.

experiences.title: Summer Internship
experiences.subtitle: Siemens Technology & Services
workDescription: Assisted in development of the model for ”Road accident Detection on CCTV Traffic Videos”, where we considered Road accident as an anomaly and applied unsupervised learning.
Achieved the accuracy of 80% on German,Avenue,and UCSD dataset.
